Tools.description: A variety of useful tools, currently featuring a random number generator, a small minecraft model creator, a text spacer and a very useful mocking text generator

3D Magic.description: A minimal minecraft model creator which displays minecraft models from their JSON format in a model viewing environment, featuring an integrated text editor to modify the model

Random figure generator.description: A tool to generate random numbers. Their amount, starting and ending point and the length of one figure after its comma is customizable

Mocking generator.description: A tool to generate text iN ThE MOcKboB sTylE which is no outdated meme at all

Spacing generator.description: A tool converting text to a format alternating between characters and spaces. The amount of spaces in between every character is customizable

Slider89.description: Slider89 is a library for easily creating and manipulating fully customizable sliders for your website, built with modern Javascript and featuring functions and practices for every purpose
